mapper.select: select h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_point, h.hotel_image, min(i.room_price) as room_price from hotel h join room_info i on h.hotel_id = i.hotel_id group by h.hotel_id, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_thema, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_point, h.hotel_image
